about_the_game:
About the game

Tactical arenas

- By immersing yourself in Odra Online, novice players will discover a world of tactical turn-based battles, while more sophisticated players will discover a lot of new and interesting game mechanics.

- Many unique arenas combined with a variety of game modes and rules will make even the most experienced players think, keeping them in a tense battle from the beginning to the end of the battle.

Unique units

- A large number of units of different classes and races, with unique abilities and interaction systems, will bring an unprecedented variety to the gameplay.

- By developing units, players will discover new ways to use and interact with them, and will have the opportunity to develop new battle tactics.

Ratings and tournaments

- A variety of rating modes will not let you get bored and sit around, pushing players to fight for higher ranks.

- Participation in tournaments will not only bring a new gaming experience, igniting the spirit of competition and adventurism, but also allow you to get a lot of different rewards.

Game interface

- The simplicity of the interface and convenient automatic systems will make your gameplay more comfortable, allowing you to quickly immerse yourself in the fascinating world of turn-based strategies.

Team games

- Take on the challenge and fight your opponents in numerous tactical arenas packed with unique game events.

- Team up and take part in team battle modes that add extra variety to the gameplay.

Battle rules

- Never before have battles been so diverse. A flexible system of settings will allow you to create a battle with suitable rules, and the rating mode is able to generate more than 450 battle options, which turns each battle into a unique challenge for you and your rivals.

- The system of tournaments held under a variety of rules additionally regulates the use of certain classes, which encourages players to constantly rethink battle tactics and create new combinations of units.    

Class system

A set of unique units that evolve as you gain experience makes the gameplay even more exciting, revealing to players the possibilities of using a variety of tactics.

Each class has its own purpose and is distinguished by unique features and ways to gain experience.

Strength and Binding Points

Fight for power points, gain access to special skills and apply them at the most unexpected moment, catching your opponents by surprise.

Master a special binding system that can surprise your opponents at any time, turning the tide of the battle in your direction.

About the game

Tactical arenas

- By immersing yourself in Odra Online, novice players will discover a world of tactical turn-based battles, while more sophisticated players will discover a lot of new and interesting game mechanics.

- Many unique arenas combined with a variety of game modes and rules will make even the most experienced players think, keeping them in a tense battle from the beginning to the end of the battle.

Unique units

- A large number of units of different classes and races, with unique abilities and interaction systems, will bring an unprecedented variety to the gameplay.

- By developing units, players will discover new ways to use and interact with them, and will have the opportunity to develop new battle tactics.

Ratings and tournaments

- A variety of rating modes will not let you get bored and sit around, pushing players to fight for higher ranks.

- Participation in tournaments will not only bring a new gaming experience, igniting the spirit of competition and adventurism, but also allow you to get a lot of different rewards.

Game interface

- The simplicity of the interface and convenient automatic systems will make your gameplay more comfortable, allowing you to quickly immerse yourself in the fascinating world of turn-based strategies.

Team games

- Take on the challenge and fight your opponents in numerous tactical arenas packed with unique game events.

- Team up and take part in team battle modes that add extra variety to the gameplay.

Battle rules

- Never before have battles been so diverse. A flexible system of settings will allow you to create a battle with suitable rules, and the rating mode is able to generate more than 450 battle options, which turns each battle into a unique challenge for you and your rivals.

- The system of tournaments held under a variety of rules additionally regulates the use of certain classes, which encourages players to constantly rethink battle tactics and create new combinations of units.    

Class system

A set of unique units that evolve as you gain experience makes the gameplay even more exciting, revealing to players the possibilities of using a variety of tactics.

Each class has its own purpose and is distinguished by unique features and ways to gain experience.

Strength and Binding Points

Fight for power points, gain access to special skills and apply them at the most unexpected moment, catching your opponents by surprise.

Master a special binding system that can surprise your opponents at any time, turning the tide of the battle in your direction.
name: Odra Online

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 660 3.3 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX460 / AMD Radeon HD5850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 660 3.3 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX460 / AMD Radeon HD5850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Meet Odra Online – a completely new multiplayer turn-based strategy game created in the Gothic fantasy style, which carries the spirit of the best games of its genre. Immerse yourself in a fantasy world with atmospheric graphics and exclusive game mechanics.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Thai, Turkish, Japanese
